articles.description: A new bipartisan $900 billion aid deal will include $15 billion for airlines, and will lead to 32,000 furloughed workers being paid again.
articles.content:
It looks like 32,000 furloughed airline employees will be back on the payroll for four months, in what can only be described as a very expensive deal.
